author: Kendall S
comment: I love this app... helps with my ping pong tournaments

author: Andrew Bonner
comment: Does not keep screen locked so I constantly lose my score when my watch goes "home". Exactly what I needed if it didn't have that issue. Oh well.
title: Has potential.

author: Will Harris
comment: Easy to use. Tap to score. Clear display.   But...(only thing but big thing) ..doesn't stay active.... If you don't touch it for a minute or so the watch goes to sleep .... Should prevent sleep when in progress...  And once sleeps, if you open app the score has reset ( on my SW3).  Hope you can fix for more stars!
title: Great stuff ... But..
